CustomField.description: If the field type is "Picklist" or "List" with template "Picklist" this defines picklist to choose. Format is "<sObject>.<Attribute>". Is ignored for any other field type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the field type is "Picklist" or "List" with template "Picklist" this defines picklist to choose. Format is "<sObject>.<Attribute>" including relevant namespace. Is ignored for any other field type.
CustomField.label: Field Picklist Target
